channel.title: Photo on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Photo on PR

item.title: Capture screenshot of the app with iPad simulator
item.description:
Until recently I was not aware of the shortcut _Ctrl + Cmd + C _

It captures the complete content of the iPad simulator to the clipboard, You can save it to a file by File -> New from Clipboard with preview.app

item.title: We are the Champions
item.description: After all the hiccups over years, we were able to witness the ultimate glory of bring back the cup to India after 28 years. India is a nation with at-least 50 million cricket experts including me. Though I’m not a professional player or an expert I do have rights to talk (who cares anyway)

item.title: My new photo (screenshot sharing) blog
item.description: A colleague told me that I should be a QA Engineer in a random conversation few months ago. Though I did not consider it but he stands by it even now. So I thought why don’t I start a photo blog to share the random screens I capture in my daily routine.
